    • Method Detail

      • putAdmiralSpaceCraft

        private int putAdmiralSpaceCraft(int x,
                       int y)
        Put the specialised Pion on the gameArea at the given position
        Parameters:
        pion - Pion who will place into the Area
        x - x position
        y - y position
        Returns:
        Return 0 if the placement is OK or -1 if it's not possible to place the Pion at given position.
